org.apache.solr.analysis

Class NorwegianLightStemFilterFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.analysis.BaseTokenFilterFactory
      • org.apache.solr.analysis.NorwegianLightStemFilterFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TokenFilterFactory

    public class NorwegianLightStemFilterFactory
extends BaseTokenFilterFactory
    Factory for NorwegianLightStemFilter. 
     <fieldType name="text_svlgtstem" class="solr.TextField" positionIncrementGap="100">
   <analyzer>
     <tokenizer class="solr.StandardTokenizerFactory"/>
     <filter class="solr.LowerCaseFilterFactory"/>
     <filter class="solr.NorwegianLightStemFilterFactory"/>
   </analyzer>
 </fieldType>

    $Id$
